creator: GamesBond
descriptionHtml:
We have a game for you. This is the ultimate first-person shooter, with levels that will make your head spin, gameplay that will keep you on the edge of your seat, and action that will make you want to come back for more FPS shooter.
Be a Commando and win the war against different characters like gangsters, secret agents, snipers, mobile legends, etc. You are in complete control in this fps gun game. Go on a rampage, combat with your friends with mad pistols and weapons upgrades to unique the modern combat warfare setting. We add new maps all the time - it is your call of duty to fight and protect your squad.
The most realistic shooting game on the market. With stunning graphics, high-quality sounds, and a very detailed environment, this game will bring you to the next level of immersion in office games.
Fight your way through an army of increasingly difficult enemies. Unlock new heroes in the battlefield and weapons as you conquer a variety of missions.
• More than 4,000 unique weapons.including Knife
•Real Commandos, Real enemies, Real Battlefield

Dozens of different types of enemies with hundreds of variations.
Targets, loot, and experience levels to suit every kind of player.
• Realistic reticles with dynamic bullet tracers.
Target a specific body part to Aim for the Shotgun to the most accurate shot possible - your health will drop faster if you hit the head or heart due to added difficulty.
• A wide variety of settings including night, dawn, and rain.
• Many different weapons to choose from including Pistols, SMGs, Assault Rifles, Shotguns, Sniper Rifles, Explosive Weapons, and Melee Weapons.

Shooter games are a subgenre of action games, which often test the player's speed and reaction time. The core element of gameplay in shooter games is aiming and shooting enemies. , with either a single-player or a competitive multiplayer mode. Shooter games are sometimes classified as action games, especially when they include other elements such as racing or puzzle-solving.

Terrorist have to Aim to be neutralized. Counter-terrorism is the active and aggressive military, political, and legal measures governments take to prevent terrorism.

Aim fire gun in the game has one of the best selections of popular, vintage, and hard to find video games.
So,if you really Like cool online shooter games? Call your fury and jump into the action and enter the battle fight strike right now. It’s totally free to play online fps games!

title: War Commando Heroes: FPS Shoot
